processing_info.project_summary: A project to create a web app that helps students improve their communication skills through assigned play

raid_entries.summary: A decision was made to share both concepts and discuss which projects to pursue after reviewing the submitted projects.
raid_entries.context: ensure that we meet the criteria for the hackathon with what we currently have . I wanted us to meet briefly to discuss this . "After that, we can discuss each project and decide which ones we want to pursue."

raid_entries.summary: There is an ongoing issue regarding the clarity of team criteria for the hackathon organized by the Post team, which needs to be clarified.
raid_entries.context: ensure that we meet the criteria for the hackathon with what we currently have . I wanted us to meet briefly to discuss this . "I was looking for the team criteria and will need to ask about that."
raid_entries.solution: Seek clarification from the Post team.

raid_entries.summary: There is uncertainty regarding the involvement of Dell in the hackathon, which could impact team planning and resource allocation.
raid_entries.context: ensure that we meet the criteria for the hackathon with what we currently have . I wanted us to meet briefly to discuss this . "Regarding Dell and Nvidia, I am unsure what Dell's involvement is."

raid_entries.summary: A decision was made to create a separate communication channel for sharing information discussed during the meeting.
raid_entries.context: ensure that we meet the criteria for the hackathon with what we currently have . I wanted us to meet briefly to discuss this . "That channel will be made into a separate channel, and I will add everyone to it."
raid_entries.solution: Create a separate channel for communication.

raid_entries.summary: It is assumed that there is no limit on the number of team members for the hackathon, but this needs to be confirmed.
raid_entries.context: ensure that we meet the criteria for the hackathon with what we currently have . I wanted us to meet briefly to discuss this . "I believe there is no limit, but I will confirm this."
raid_entries.solution: Confirm the team member limit with the hackathon organizers.

raid_entries.summary: A decision was made to schedule a meeting for the following week to determine the best day for everyone to discuss project progress.
raid_entries.context: ensure that we meet the criteria for the hackathon with what we currently have . I wanted us to meet briefly to discuss this . "I will schedule a meeting for next week and determine the best day for everyone."
